name: Youth Services
description: Youth services at the Pacific Center focus on the empowerment, mental health and safety of LGBTQ youth (ages 12-17) through several programs: - The LOUD after-school youth program for LGBTQIA+ youth (weekly from 4pm-6pm on Tuesday and Friday, contact LOUDyouth@pacificcenter.org) - BOLD support group for LGBTQIA+, Black, and Brown middle school and high school students (contact BOLDyouth@pacificcenter.org) - Trans Tween Group for transgender and gender creative youth (ages 9-13, 1st & 3rd Saturda

whatTheyOffer: Youth services at the Pacific Center focus on the empowerment, mental health and safety of LGBTQ youth (ages 12-17) through several programs: - The LOUD after-school youth program for LGBTQIA+ youth (weekly from 4pm-6pm on Tuesday and Friday, contact LOUDyouth@pacificcenter.org) - BOLD support group for LGBTQIA+, Black, and Brown middle school and high school students (contact BOLDyouth@pacificcenter.org) - Trans Tween Group for transgender and gender creative youth (ages 9-13, 1st & 3rd Saturda
howToGetIt: Call or email for more information. WINTER UPDATES: The Center will be closed for Winter Break from December 22-January 5. In-person groups will meet the following Saturdays: 12/6, 12/20, 1/10 and 1/24. We will return to meeting on first and third Saturdays in Feb 2026.
